title: Investigation of mitochondrial phenotypes in motor neurons derived by direct conversion of fibroblasts from familial ALS subjects
details: E Woo, F Tasnim, H Kawamata, G Manfredi, C Konrad - bioRxiv, 2025
abstract: Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) is a progressive neurodegenerative disease of motor neurons, leading to fatal muscle paralysis. Familial forms of ALS (fALS) account for approximately 10% of cases and are associated with mutations in …
